title: Bloomberg Markets: Allegations Against Brazil's President
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Allegations Against Brazil's President
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Raymond Colitt\u0010Bloomberg Brazil Bureau Chief\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Will discuss new corruption allegations against Brazil's President Michael Temer.\u0010\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Damian Sassower\u0010Fixed Income Strategist\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence\u0010Will discuss new corruption allegations against Brazil's President Michael Temer.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
